title: 【Upgraded】KIZJORYA Dance Mat for Kids, Electronic Light-up Dance Pad with Wireless Bluetooth 5 Speeds 9 Levels, Dancing Mat for Toddlers Music Game Dance Toy for Girls Boys 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 10+ Year Old
descriptions:
Turn up the fun and get kids moving with the Upgraded KIZJORYA Dance Mat for Kids—an interactive, light-up music game that brings the dance floor to your living room. Designed for ages 3–12, this extra-large 39x41-inch dance pad combines active play, learning, and music into one exciting gift for girls and boys.

Why kids (and parents) love it:
- Wireless Bluetooth freedom: Pair with any Bluetooth-enabled device to play your child’s favorite songs. Instant dance party, no cords required.
- 3 game modes, endless excitement: Switch between Free Dance, Memory Mode, and Bluetooth Mode to keep challenges fresh and fun.
- Grows with your child: 5 speeds and 9 difficulty levels help build coordination, rhythm, and memory skills—from beginner to little pro.
- See the score, beat the best: LED score display and volume keys make play easy and motivating.
- Safe, soft, and sturdy: Cushioned, non-toxic, odorless vinyl is gentle on little feet, while the non-slip silicone base keeps every jump secure. Waterproof for worry-free cleanup.
- Room to move: The extra-large size lets kids step, hop, and spin with plenty of space—no weight restrictions for worry-free play.

Perfect for birthdays, Christmas, and everyday screen-free fun, the KIZJORYA Dance Mat sparks confidence, boosts coordination, and turns exercise into a game. Just add 4 AA batteries (not included), connect via Bluetooth, and watch them light up the room—one dance at a time.
